Title: Are the Steelers still willing/able to pay Ben Roethlisberger $19 million this year?
Description: It’s one thing for the Steelers to want to bring quarterback Ben Roethlisberger back for another year. It’s quite another for the Steelers to want to pay him the full $19 million he’s due to make in 2021.
Author: NBC Sports on MSN.com
